page.title: 17Health
page.content: Hospitals-Disease Patterns-Treatment In the last 30 years, the time that I have been here, there have been a few changes only in the health picture The County and General Hospitals remain the main centres.Cottage Hospitals at Kington and Leominster provide cover for less serious cases.Geriatric units are also still in use in Kington and Leominster. There is no startling change in incidence and treatment except that we seem to be spared the devastating influenza epidemics of the past.Viral infections are still present,of course, but are now fairly evenly spread throughout the year.The greatest advances have occured in treatment and the great range of antibiotics now available (I started with but two of them).Effective treatment for hypertension and heart
